name: Opened_Pantheon_1
logic: GG_Atrium + ((Defeated_Gruz_Mother + Defeated_False_Knight + Defeated_Massive_Moss_Charger + Defeated_Hornet_1 + Defeated_Gorb + Defeated_Dung_Defender + Defeated_Soul_Warrior + Defeated_Brooding_Mawlek) | (PANTHEON_KEY_1 ? FALSE))

name: Opened_Pantheon_2
logic: GG_Atrium + ((Defeated_Xero + Defeated_Crystal_Guardian + Defeated_Soul_Master + Defeated_Colosseum_2 + Defeated_Mantis_Lords + Defeated_Marmu + Defeated_Nosk + Defeated_Flukemarm + Defeated_Broken_Vessel) | (PANTHEON_KEY_2 ? FALSE))

name: Opened_Pantheon_3
logic: GG_Atrium + ((Defeated_Hive_Knight + Defeated_Elder_Hu + Defeated_Collector + Defeated_Colosseum_2 + Defeated_Grimm + Defeated_Galien + Defeated_Uumuu + Defeated_Hornet_2) | (PANTHEON_KEY_3 ? FALSE))

name: Opened_Pantheon_4
logic: GG_Atrium + (PANTHEON_COMPLETION_1 ? Defeated_Pantheon_1 + PANTHEON_COMPLETION_2 ? Defeated_Pantheon_2 + PANTHEON_COMPLETION_3 ? Defeated_Pantheon_3 + Defeated_Enraged_Guardian + Defeated_Broken_Vessel + Defeated_No_Eyes + Defeated_Traitor_Lord + Defeated_Dung_Defender + Defeated_Failed_Champion + Defeated_Markoth + Defeated_Watcher_Knights + Defeated_Soul_Tyrant | (PANTHEON_KEY_4 ? FALSE))

name: Opened_Pantheon_5
logic: GG_Atrium_Roof + WINGS + ANYCLAW + VOIDHEART | PANTHEON_KEY_5 ? FALSE

name: Defeated_God_Tamer
logic: Room_Colosseum_01[left1] + Can_Replenish_Geo + (ANYCLAW | (SPICYCOMBATSKIPS + WINGS)) + COMBAT[Colosseum_3] + (READ ? TRUE) + (COLO_KEY_3 ? TRUE)

name: Ascended_Combat
logic: NAILCOMBAT + SPELLS>1 + QUAKE + (FULLDASH | ANYDASH + MILDCOMBATSKIPS) | SPICYCOMBATSKIPS

name: Radiant_Combat
logic: NAILCOMBAT + QUAKE>1 | (CURSED + QUAKE) + (FULLSHADOWDASH | ANYSHADOWDASH + MILDCOMBATSKIPS) | SPICYCOMBATSKIPS
